titles.title: O for a Thousand Tongues to Sing

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O, for a thousand tongues to sing my great Redeemer's praise, the glories of my God and King, the triumphs of His grace.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus! the name that charms our fears, that bids our sorrows cease! 'Tis music in the sinner's ears; 'tis life, and health, and peace.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Hear Him, ye deaf! His praise, ye dumb, your loosened tongues employ! Ye blind, behold your Savior come, and leap, ye lame, for joy!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: My gracious Master and my God, assist me to proclaim, to spread through all the earth abroad the honors of Thy name.
